Text: Fake!! its just a Gold Rush Dirt Special, not what description promises
It's not fake u a$$hole. It is ep10.

This is not the "Leprechaun Gold" episode!
Leprechaun Gold is not aired yet (Jan 4th, 2013). 
This is "Bio Special (The Dirt)" episode, who aired on December 28, 2012.
I call Bullshit! This file is The Dirt, not a proper ep at all. The description makes it a fake.
The Dirt and nothing else. The description does in no way match the file. Fake.
Many sites have this wrongly named. -BALLSITIC grp says it's ep 10. I only uploaded it here.

Yup, my desc is wrong. It's actually this :
“The Dirt – Bio Special”
Executive Producer Christo Doyle digs deeper into the personal lives of the miners while their wives offer up secrets about their early years. Also included is a special sneak peek of what’s ahead in second half of the Gold Rush “Do or Die” season

But it's still ep10 according to the release grp.

Too fucking funny, people don't seem to understand the difference between fake and incorrect labeling.

Thanks anyways ShoReleases.

Works fine. Perhaps those who negative comment should make the effort to u/l rather than d/l and then dog on about a stupid label without appreciation for the 'free' effort. Must be good to be one 'tough ones' who hide behind the anonymity of TPB. Thanx for your effort...

Listen, all i said was that whoever uploads something needs to label it correctly. I don't give a rats ass if it's free or not on who uploads it or d/ls it. This kind of stuff has been going on for ever you'd think that ppl would learn by now how to do it correctly.
